About

About Me

Currently working as a .NET developer at Search Laboratory and playing around with F# & other fun things outside of work.

I also like Red Fedoras.

About My Blog

This blog uses a slightly customised Hyde template for the Jekyll platform.

Blog posts are either written in markdown or as F# script files which are later converted to markdown using F# formatting using a process very similar to the one described by Colin Bull in his blog.
